name: Moussaka
description: Chunks of chicken marinated in a yogurt and spice paste, then cooked in a creamy sauce with tomatoes and herbs.

name: Dolmades
description: Grape leaves stuffed with rice, pine nuts, and herbs, often served with a yogurt sauce.
